entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is the teacher who is giving a lecture to his students. He is standing behind his desk when the clock chimes eleven o'clock.

entities.name: lestrange
entities.description: Lestrange is one of the students in Professor Slughorn's class. He is being reminded by Professor Slughorn to submit his essay on time.

entities.name: avery
entities.description: Avery is another student in Professor Slughorn's class who is also being reminded to submit his essay on time.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is a prefect and one of the students in Professor Slughorn's class. He is still standing after the other boys have left the room.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Horcruxes are mysterious objects that Tom Riddle wants to know more about from Professor Slughorn.

relationships.description: Professor Slughorn assigns Lestrange the task of submitting his essay by tomorrow, or he will be given detention.
Professor Slughorn also assigns Avery the task of submitting his essay by tomorrow, or he will be given detention.
Tom Riddle expresses interest in learning more about Horcruxes from Professor Slughorn.
